name: Echoes of the Fey: The Last Sacrament
description: Magic meets mystery in Echoes of the Fey, a series of detective stories in a world of high fantasy. Play as Sofya Rykov, a private investigator with a secret of her own: sheâ€™s the only Human who can wield magic. Each episode is a narrative-heavy adventure game with branching story-lines and a standalone plot.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Microsoft Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q8200 2.33GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD 7500 or NVIDIA GT 555M video card Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
